article.Heading: Demonetisation a success, should benefit organised sector: Enam
article.Summary: Chairman of Enam Securities Vallabh Bhansali believes demonetisation is a success despite ‘flip-flop on rules that government has to calibrate on daily basis.’
article.Body:
Chairman of Enam Securities Vallabh Bhansali believes demonetisation is a success despite ‘flip-flop on rules that government has to calibrate on daily basis.’

Demonetisation has positives too. Now every single rupee has an address, Bhansali said. The move will give access to data and will certainly benefit the organised sector.

On the upcoming Budget and capex push, he said the government can only spend from the allocated amount. In the current fiscal, the government has tried spending the promised amount on projects to push expenditure.

Watch video for more..
